description: Your one-stop solution for acing the Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test. Practice questions, mock tests, and personalized study plans, all in one place.

practiceQuestions.title: Practice Questions
practiceQuestions.description: Sharpen your skills with our extensive, multilingual question bank covering all subjects.

mockTests.title: Mock Tests
mockTests.description: Simulate the real exam experience with full-length, timed mock tests for Paper I & II.
